snippet: Rabbi Yoel Malik, 33, is accused of abusing three students from the school he ran in Borough Park.
abstract: Rabbi Yoel Malik of Clinton Hill is charged with sexually abusing three teenage boys from a school he ran in Brooklyn; case is likely to shine yet another spotlight on a secretive community grappling with abuse allegations.
lead_paragraph: Rabbi Yoel Malik, 33, is accused of abusing three students from the school he ran in Borough Park.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Rabbi Charged With Sexual Abuse of Boys
headline.main: Brooklyn Rabbi Charged With Sexual Abuse of Boys
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Rabbi Charged With Sexual Abuse of Boys
